TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ALFormat extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Sound samples: Format specifier.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALFormat Mono16 = int32(4353)

Docs.summary: 1 Channel, 16 Bits per sample.

Docs.summary: 1 Channel, 8 Bits per sample.

Docs.summary: 1 Channel, double-precision floating-point data. Requires Extension: AL_EXT_double
